Sorry folks due to our machine in capablity we could not integrate arch cosmoshub payment but be at ease we are available for you 24/7 working on getting new ones but here is an alternative

Complete your transaction by following the few steps Sending Archway TokensðŸ’± Using Keplr Wallet

Step 1: Open Keplr Wallet

Open the Keplr Wallet extension in your browser. Ensure you are logged in and have Archway tokens in your wallet. click here to get them, the interface is well design for you to understand.

When it opens and connect your keplr wallet to it at the top right of the page

Connecting Archay Cosmos

Upon opening the kepler wallet at the buttom of the hamburger icon click on the Add more chain and search for Archwayadd it to keplr

After that navigate to the hamburger icon and click on the Manage Chain Visibiltyand add archway

Step 2: Navigate to the Send Page

Click on the "Send" tab in the Keplr Wallet interface to go to the send tokens page.

Step 3: Enter Payment Details

In the send tokens form, enter the recipient's wallet address (that's our keplr wallet arch address), the amount of Archway tokens to send, and any optional memo.

Step 4: Confirm the Transaction

Review the transaction details carefully. If everything is correct, confirm the transaction by clicking the "Send" button.

Step 5: Transaction Successful

You will receive a confirmation notification once the transaction is successfully processed. The tokens should now be sent to the recipient's wallet.
